title.rendered: Kitchen Organization Ideas That Are Pretty and Functional

content.rendered:
From shelves to cabinets and cubbies: We’re loving these takes on kitchen organization

A well-ordered pantry, whether it’s a whole room, a separate cabinet, or built-in shelves, will give your kitchen a custom touch. We scoured Pinterest to find a few of our favorites.

Stylish Storehouse 


(Image Credit: NEAT Method, Photography by Michelle Drewes)

A Step Up


(Design Credit: Studio McGee for Food Network)

Butler Beauty 


(Image Credit: Zillow)

Orderly Oasis


(Image Credit: Blog Lovin’)

Hidden Gem


(Image Credit: Sweeten renovators Melina and Fabio’s kitchen)

Open Storage 


(Image Credit: Laura Moss for HGTV Magazine)

–

Sweeten is a free service that matches renovators with vetted general contractors, helping until project completion.
